result.execSummary:
The defendant Ramon Turrell Purifoy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ramon Turrell Purifoy is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Ramon Turrell Purifoy was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:

Consecutive to: any other sentence

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

ADDRESS INFO for Ramon Turrell Purifoy
Current: 822 E. Main Street, Reedsburg, WI 53959 United States  (Effective: 10-23-2017)
Prior: 330 S. Locust, Reedsburg, WI 53959

Atty O'Rourke acknowledges rec. information, waives reading and enters NC plea to Ct 1.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty and sentences.

Ct 1:  NC
20 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 3/13/2016 at 6:00 pm
1 day credit to be applied
$518.00 costs/surcharges to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
DNA sample to be provided
Ct 2:  Dismissed

Defendant Ramon Turrell Purifoy in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states agreement.  Atty O'Rourke agrees and states DE will waive his right to prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause and binds over.

Attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty O'Rourke requests reset to Wednesday as DE's vehicle broke down this morning.  State agrees to reset.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Proceedings stopped and to be set in Br. 3.  Code can not be removed from CCAP.

Defendant Ramon Turrell Purifoy in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea to Count 1.  Dismiss Count 2.   Attorney ORourke gives sentencing recommendation.  State agrees.  Court addresses previous felony record.  Attorney ORourke agrees to set felony sentencing in Br. 3.  State request status conf. or sentencing date on Br. 3 intake.  Bond continues.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 11, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 12-04-2015 10:00 am.
Return date at 12-17-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Ramon Turrell Purifoy appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Kevin R. Calkins appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does qualify and address is accurate.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State request signature bond.  Time limits waived. $1000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
